sentences.sContent: ...outgoing Chancellor John Morgan said an internal analysis showed that each campus’ spending on facilities management fell well below the industry standards identified by the state...

...Data on management expenses at the college system and in other state departments will be part of a “business justification” the state will use as officials deliberate the specifics of an outsourcing plan...

...The state’s facilities management project team is still in the process of developing its business justification and expects to have that completed and available to the public at the end of February...
...and chronic disease management to make sure the seriously ill...
...Sustainable management of ecosystems will prove rewarding in the long run...

...A recent article in The Harvard Crimson noted the shocking growth of Harvard's public relations arm in the last five years and it questioned whether a focus on risk management and avoiding controversy was really the best outward-looking face of this great institution...
...provided that management adopts the new lean and green model...
...It suggests that one of the biggest levers for delivering this opportunity is "increased efficiency through management and behavioural change" — in other words...
...Why did the author participate in the Wharton School management program...
...Eleven summers ago I was sent to a management program at the Wharton School to be prepared for bigger things...

synos.tran: [管理]管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段

phrases.pCn: 物业管理；资产管理；物业管理专员
人力资源管理；人力调配

remMethod.val: man(人) ＋ age(年纪) ＋ ment → 一般管理人员都年龄较大， 富有经验 → 管理人员

words.tran: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位

trans.tranCn: 管理； 处理； 管理部门， 管理人员
trans.tranOther: the activity of controlling and organizing the work that a company or organization does
